author: Ted Kilgore
description: Spirituous, smoky, earthy, bittersweet, floral, herbal and complex. I've reduced the original serve by one-third to produce a complex, serious and most satisfying but bite-sized libation. Described by its creator as being "short and evil." Some will love, but many will hate!
name: Devil's Soul
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and fine strain into a chilled glass
